name: REGULAR FIT
description:
REGULAR FIT - As a tramp, you embark on a dangerous and mysterious journey through a dense forest full of amazing creatures and unseemly obstacles. Your main goal in this game is to survive in this cruel world. You will face various challenges such as jumping over cliffs, weaving through dangerous chasms and fighting aggressive creatures that inhabit the forest.

The graphics in the game are done in an attractive pixel style, which adds some nostalgic appeal to the game. The soundtrack also creates a great atmosphere of the game, reflecting its mystery and danger.

The game is a 2D platformer. You need to go through various levels, destroy many enemies and complete assigned tasks.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Lots of levels
- Good soundtrack
